text: thuma jaealnak -aiyaha alrasula- ealaa minhaj wadih min 'amr aldiyni, fatabie alshryet alty jaealnak ealayha, wala tatabie 'ahwa' aljahilin bshre allah aladhin la yaelamun alhuq. wafi alayat dalalatan eazimat ealaa kamal hdha aldiyn washarfiha, wawujub alanqiad lihukmihi, waeadam almil 'iilaa 'ahwa' alkafarat walmulhadina
